title: Systematic Science Concept Development Process via Scaffolding-Based Concept Mapping Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific concepts and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: A program providing personalized scaffolding tailored to learners' prior knowledge levels in a collaborative learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design concept maps connecting core concepts of a given science topic
Learners visualize hierarchical structures between concepts according to scaffolding support levels using digital tools
Learners improve the logical consistency of concept maps by 80% or more through peer assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
